Management.noPendingOfficers: There are no officers pending access to a force.
Management.noCustomFields: There are no custom fields yet
Management.noCustomRoles: There are no custom roles yet.
Management.manageCourthouseDescription: Here you can manage record seal requests, deed poll requests and pending warrants.
Management.manageCustomFieldsDescription: Here you can manage custom fields. These are fields can be added by any officers to citizens in name-search.
Management.manageCustomRolesDescription: Here you can manage custom roles. These roles can be assigned to users instead of giving permissions one by one.
Management.importCitizensDescription: Here you can mass import citizens that may not be connected to a registered user.
Management.importVehiclesDescription: Here you can mass import vehicles that are registered to a citizen. In the table below you can see all registered vehicles.
Management.importWeaponsDescription: Here you can mass import weapons that are registered to a citizen. In the table below you can see all registered weapons.
Management.alert_deleteCustomRole: Are you sure you want to delete {role}? This action cannot be undone
Management.alert_deleteUnit: Are you sure you want to delete {unit}? This action cannot be undone!
Management.alert_deleteCustomField: Are you sure you want to delete this custom field? This action cannot be undone. All values created with this field will also be deleted.
Management.info_pendingBusinesses: These are created businesses that are awaiting approval to be used. Accept or decline them.
Management.alert_deleteBusiness: Are you sure you want to delete this {name}? All it's data will be lost. This action cannot be undone.

CadSettings.callsignTemplateInfo: This is the template for unit callsigns. You can use the following variables: {variables}
CadSettings.caseNumberTemplateInfo: This is the template for record case numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}
CadSettings.pairedUnitTemplateInfo: This is the template for paired units. You can use the following variables: {variables}

DiscordRolesTab.discordRolesInfo: When a CAD user authenticates via Discord, the respective CAD permissions will be granted to that CAD user from their Discord roles.
DiscordRolesTab.adminRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set admin permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set police permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoSupervisorRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set police Supervisor permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.emsFdRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set emergency service permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.dispatchRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set control permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.towRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set tow permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.taxiRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set taxi permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.courthouseRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set courthouse permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.whitelistedRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent whitelisted access.

DiscordWebhooksTab.discordWebhooksInfo: Select a channel for each webhook type. This will create a new Discord webhook and send webhooks on the respective event type.
DiscordWebhooksTab.calls911ChannelInfo: The Discord channel where 911 calls will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.statusUpdatesChannelInfo: The Discord channel where status updates will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.panicButtonChannelInfo: The Discord channel where panic button triggers will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.bolosChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new remarks will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.impoundedVehicleChannelInfo: The Discord channel where impounded vehicle notifications will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.citizenRecordsChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new arrest reports, tickets, warrants and written warnings will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.warrantsChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new warrants will be sent to.
